ValueSet-IMMZD2DTPolioBirthDoseVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD2DTPolioBirthDose ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was not administered-146
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is due for the bOPV birth dose-87
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is more than or equal to 1 week-39
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is not due for the bOPV birth dose-48
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#bOPV birth dose (a zero dose) was administered-146
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTPolioBirthDoseVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTPolioBirthDose ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTPolioBirthDoseVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
